You start with 40 M€ and 10 steel. AS YO: You start with 40 M€ and 10 steel. AS YOUR FIRST ACTION, PLACE A COMMUNITY [PLAYER MARKER] ON A NON-RESERVED AREA.
ACTION: PLACE A COMMUNITY (PLAYER MARKER: ACTION: PLACE A COMMUNITY (PLAYER MARKER) ON A NON-RESERVED AREA ADJACENT TO ONE OF YOUR TILES OR MARKED AREAS.
EFFECT: MARKED AREAS ARE RESERVED FOR YO: EFFECT: MARKED AREAS ARE RESERVED FOR YOU. WHEN YOU PLACE A TILE THERE, GAIN 3 M€.
You start with 35 M€ and 3 asteroid reso: You start with 35 M€ and 3 asteroid resources.
Action: Add an asteroid resource to ANY: Action: Add an asteroid resource to ANY card OR gain any standard resource, OR remove an asteroid resource from this card to gain 3 titanium.
You start with 37 M€. Increase your stee: You start with 37 M€. Increase your steel production 1 step.
Action: Increase your energy production: Action: Increase your energy production 1 step IF YOU HAVE NO ENERGY RESOURCES, or spend 3M€ to draw a building card.
You start with 33 M€. Increase titanium: You start with 33 M€. Increase titanium production 1 step.
Action: Add 1 asteroid here for every sp: Action: Add 1 asteroid here for every space tag you have.
Effect: When you use the AQUIFER or ASTE: Effect: When you use the AQUIFER or ASTEROID standard projects, you can spend asteroids on card as 1M€ each.
You start with 48 M€. Increase your M€ p: You start with 48 M€. Increase your M€ production 4 steps. ALL OPPONENTS DECREASE THEIR M€ production 2 STEPS. THIS DOES NOT TRIGGER THE EFFECT BELOW.
Effect: When a player causes another pla: Effect: When a player causes another player to decrease production or lose resources, pay 3M€ to the victim, or as much as possible.
You start with 54 M€ . Draw a Science ca: Vous démarrez avec 54 M€. Piochez une carte Science.
Effect: When ANY microbe tag is played,: Effet : Lorsque N'IMPORTE QUEL badge microbe est joué, ajoutez une maladie sur cette carte et perdez 4 M€ (ou autant que possible). Lorsque vous jouez un badge Science, retirez une maladie de cette carte et augmenter votre NT de 1, OU s'il n'y a aucune maladie sur cette carte, vous pouvez augmenter votre NT de 3 et placer cette carte dans votre pile ÉVÉNEMENTS.
You start with 47 M€. As your first acti: You start with 47 M€. As your first action, place a greenery tile and raise the oxygen 1 step.
Effect: Each new adjacency between your: Effect: Each new adjacency between your tile and an opponent's tile gives you a standard resource of your choice [regardless of who just placed a tile].
You start with 38 M€ and 1 steel product: You start with 38 M€ and 1 steel production.
Effect: When you play a building tag, in: Effect: When you play a building tag, including this, gain 1 microbe to this card, or remove 2 microbes here and raise your plant production 1 step.
You start with 42 M€. Increase your ener: You start with 42 M€. Increase your energy production 1 step.
Action: Spend any amount of energy to dr: Action: Spend any amount of energy to draw the that many cards. Keep 1 and discard the rest.
You start with 44 M€. As your first acti: You start with 44 M€. As your first action, reveal cards until you have revealed a microbe tag. Take it and discard the rest.
Effect: when a microbe tag is played, in: Effect: when a microbe tag is played, incl. this, THAT PLAYER gains 2 M€, or adds a microbe to THAT card, and you gain 2 M€.
